Enchant creature

flavor: On darkness feeding, in nightmares breeding.
name: Looming Shade
text: {B}: Looming Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

flavor: Memories cut from the mind can cut right back.
name: Megrim

title: Megrim

flavor: What wizards fear most is losing their minds.
name: Mind Rot
text: Target player discards two cards.

flavor: No fear. No sense. And soon, no lunch.
name: Nausea
text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
title: Nausea

name: Necrologia
text:
Cast Necrologia only during your end step.
As an additional cost to cast Necrologia, pay X life.
Draw X cards.

flavor: The thunder of its hooves beats dreams into despair.
name: Nightmare
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.
title: Nightmare

flavor: The Eastern Paladin doesn't attack at night for the tactical advantage. He does it for the sheer joy of fighting beneath the moon.
name: Nocturnal Raid
text: Black creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
title: Nocturnal Raid

flavor:
Defeating an enemy is not nearly as satisfying as watching one suffer."
—The Western Paladin
name: Oppression
text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player discards a card.

flavor: You won't be needing this.
name: Ostracize
text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a creature card from it. That player discards that card.

flavor: I want every last one of these tree-hugging, earth-loving, pointy-eared weaklings out of here. Now!
name: Persecute
text: Choose a color. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards of that color.
title: Persecute

flavor: No one knows whether they were named for the diseases they carry or for the speed at which they multiply.
name: Plague Beetle
text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
title: Plague Beetle

flavor: He hunts what might have been.
name: Rag Man

flavor: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.
name: Raise Dead
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

flavor: The battle's end is the meal's beginning.
name: Reprocess

flavor: It eats death and drinks pain.
name: Revenant

Flying
Revenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
title: Revenant

flavor:
They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose,
Nor spake, nor moved their eyes;
It had been strange, even in a dream,
To have seen those dead men rise."
—Samuel Taylor Coleridge,
"The Rime of the Ancient Mariner
name: Scathe Zombies
title: Scathe Zombies

flavor: You are who you eat.

flavor: What it lacks in backbone, it makes up for in cruelty.

name: Unholy Strength

Enchant creature

—The Northern Paladin

It is a slaughter, the death of a sea. Never speak of it again."

flavor: Every branch a crossroads, every vine a swift steed.
name: Wood Elves
text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
title: Wood Elves

flavor: Her roots connect her to the forest's wishes.
name: Yavimaya Enchantress
text: Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment on the battlefield.
title: Yavimaya Enchantress

flavor: Some say Aladdin's third wish was for this ring.
name: Aladdin's Ring
text: {8}, {T}: Aladdin's Ring deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
title: Aladdin's Ring

flavor: The heavier the load, the harder it works.
name: Beast of Burden
text: Beast of Burden's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures on the battlefield.
title: Beast of Burden

flavor: The Eastern Paladin knew how highly his southern rival valued horses, so he gleefully prepared a suitable welcome.
name: Caltrops
text: Whenever a creature attacks, Caltrops deals 1 damage to it.
title: Caltrops

name: Charcoal Diamond
text:
Charcoal Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
title: Charcoal Diamond

name: Coat of Arms
text: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)
title: Coat of Arms

flavor: Polished by a thousand waves.
name: Crystal Rod
text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
title: Crystal Rod

flavor: Legend has it that the world was hatched from a dingus egg.
name: Dingus Egg
text: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Dingus Egg deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
title: Dingus Egg

name: Disrupting Scepter
text: {3}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only during your turn.
title: Disrupting Scepter

flavor: Bridges usually get you from one place to another. This one just gets you.
name: Ensnaring Bridge
text: Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.
title: Ensnaring Bridge

flavor: Feroz is gone, but what remains is his final gift to his people: the right to be left alone.
name: Feroz's Ban
text: Creature spells cost {2} more to cast.
title: Feroz's Ban

name: Fire Diamond
text:
Fire Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
title: Fire Diamond

flavor: Wheeeeeeeeeeeeeee!
name: Flying Carpet
text: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
title: Flying Carpet

flavor: Every day, I fight for my life and win. Every night, I fight to remember my name and lose.
name: Grafted Skullcap
text:
At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.
At the beginning of your end step, discard your hand.
title: Grafted Skullcap

flavor: The Southern Paladin taught the airborne vermin to fear the storm that rains upward.
name: Grapeshot Catapult
text: {T}: Grapeshot Catapult deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.
title: Grapeshot Catapult

flavor: Legend has it that the mine howls out the last words of those who died inside.
name: Howling Mine
text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.
title: Howling Mine

flavor: Forged by a thousand flames.
name: Iron Star
text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
title: Iron Star

flavor: Blessed by a thousand prayers.
name: Ivory Cup
text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
title: Ivory Cup

flavor: Most books simply deliver knowledge. This one expects some in return.
name: Jalum Tome
text: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
title: Jalum Tome

flavor:
Your heart's desire is found within.
—Saddlebag inscription
name: Jandor's Saddlebags
text: {3}, {T}: Untap target creature.
title: Jandor's Saddlebags

flavor:
Knowledge is power."
—Sir Francis Bacon,
Meditationes Sacrae
name: Jayemdae Tome
text: {4}, {T}: Draw a card.
title: Jayemdae Tome

name: Marble Diamond
text:
Marble Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
title: Marble Diamond

flavor: The bigger they are, the stronger its pull.
name: Meekstone
text: Creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
title: Meekstone

flavor: More than one mage has been driven insane by the sound of the millstone relentlessly grinding away.
name: Millstone
text: {2}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
title: Millstone

name: Moss Diamond
text:
Moss Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
title: Moss Diamond

flavor: Its wings were only designed to be ornamental, but it learned to use them on its own.
name: Patagia Golem
text: {3}: Patagia Golem gains flying until end of turn.
title: Patagia Golem

name: Phyrexian Colossus
text:
Phyrexian Colossus doesn't untap during your untap step.
Pay 8 life: Untap Phyrexian Colossus.
Phyrexian Colossus can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
title: Phyrexian Colossus

flavor:
It doesn't think. It doesn't feel.
It doesn't laugh or cry.
All it does from dusk till dawn
Is make the soldiers die.
—Onean children's rhyme
name: Phyrexian Hulk
title: Phyrexian Hulk

flavor:
Never forget your feet
—Elvish expression meaning
"watch your step
name: Pit Trap
text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Pit Trap: Destroy target attacking creature without flying. It can't be regenerated.
title: Pit Trap

flavor: The rod is a relic from ancient times . . . cruel, vicious, mean-spirited times.
name: Rod of Ruin
text: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
title: Rod of Ruin

flavor: I'm not one for pretty things," said Sisay. "Unless they're pretty useful as well.
name: Sisay's Ring
text: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.
title: Sisay's Ring

name: Sky Diamond
text:
Sky Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
title: Sky Diamond

name: Soul Net
text: Whenever a creature dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
title: Soul Net

flavor: Knowledge knows no bounds.
name: Spellbook
text: You have no maximum hand size.
title: Spellbook

flavor: The warriors fought against the paralyzing waves until even their thoughts froze in place.
name: Static Orb
text: As long as Static Orb is untapped, players can't untap more than two permanents during their untap steps.
title: Static Orb

name: Storm Cauldron
text:
Each player may play an additional land during each of his or her turns.
Whenever a land is tapped for mana, return it to its owner's hand.
title: Storm Cauldron

name: Teferi's Puzzle Box
text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player puts the cards in his or her hand on the bottom of his or her library in any order, then draws that many cards.
title: Teferi's Puzzle Box

flavor: Tainted by a thousand fears.
name: Throne of Bone
text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
title: Throne of Bone

flavor:
A stick is your friend. A pointed stick is your good friend. An army of pointed sticks is your best friend."
—Onean sergeant
name: Wall of Spears
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
First strike
title: Wall of Spears

flavor: Strengthened by a thousand limbs.
name: Wooden Sphere
text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
title: Wooden Sphere

name: Adarkar Wastes
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool. Adarkar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.
title: Adarkar Wastes

name: Brushland
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. Brushland deals 1 damage to you.
title: Brushland

name: City of Brass
text:
Whenever City of Brass becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
title: City of Brass

name: Karplusan Forest
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Karplusan Forest deals 1 damage to you.
title: Karplusan Forest

name: Sulfurous Springs
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Sulfurous Springs deals 1 damage to you.
title: Sulfurous Springs

name: Underground River
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Underground River deals 1 damage to you.
title: Underground River
